    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerController

        public ServerController(@NonNull Visualizer visualizer)
        Creates a new ServerController instance. It registers all available CommandHandlers and CommandLineOptionHandlers that are meant for the server.
        Parameters:
        visualizer - the main application instance

        public @NonNull java.lang.String getHelpMessage()
        Description copied from class: GreenMirrorController
        Gets the help message that is associated with the command line usage of the application. The first %s will be replaced by the help screen generated by JOpt Simple.
        Specified by:
